scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r src/microservices/schema.sql dist/microservices/ && cp -r src/microservices/gateway dist/microservices/ && cp -r src/microservices/websocket dist/microservices/ && cp -r src/microservices/game dist/microservices/ && cp -r src/public dist/ && cp -r certs dist/
scripts.verify-build: npm run build && echo '=== Estructura compilada ===' && find dist -type f -name '*.js' | sort && echo '=== Gateway existe? ===' && ls -la dist/microservices/gateway/ && echo '=== Websocket existe? ===' && ls -la dist/microservices/websocket/
